reviewText:
The humor used in this video helped the information be well received by the audience and thus be more likely to be remembered.  The video was shipped in a timely manner and packaged safely.

Thank you.

I use this video as part of the curriculum for my middle school Teen Skills class.  The format is both informative and fun!  The kids are always so surprised by what they do and do not know.
This should be required viewing for every teen!  There is a lot of material, and it goes by quickly.  You will need more than one viewing.
